ShadowProfile.Condition: Data.HasCompletedQuest('Return to Brock') == false and Data.MyRace() == WoWRace.Gnome or Data.HasCompletedQuest('Return to Brock') == false and Data.MyRace() == WoWRace.Dwarf

If.Condition: Data.HasActiveQuest('Honor Students') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Honor Students') == false
Data.HasActiveQuest('Ride to Ironforge') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Ride to Ironforge') == false
Data.HasActiveQuest('Gryth Thurden') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Gryth Thurden') == false
Data.HasActiveQuest('Find Bingles') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Bingles\' Missing Supplies') == false
Data.HasActiveQuest('Return to Brock') == false and Data.HasCompletedQuest('Return to Brock') == false
